overview: What does it mean to be gay in our society? How do gay men feel about societyâ€™s view on them? How has their sexual orientation impacted their life? How do they live out their sexuality? We asked these questions and many more in 8 interviews we did with homosexual men in a variety of German cities. They talk about their personal experiences, about life and love. Their different perspectives make for a colourful variety of opinions and experiences.
title: Men Who Love Men
